PageWidgetPortable.Title: Conjuntos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_MA_RECURSOPARTES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT PARTE FROM MF_HISTORICOLOCACAOPARTES WHERE PARTE = A.HANDLE AND ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) AND TIPO = 2 AND DATA = (SELECT MAX(DATA) FROM MF_HISTORICOLOCACAOPARTES WHERE PARTE = A.HANDLE AND ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) AND TIPO = 2 )) AND PARTEPNEU = 1 AND RECURSO IS NULL AND SITUACAO = 2 AND (A.ALMOXARIFADO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2349_at4215_hsecf39937.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Histórico de controle de reposição
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_STATUS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLETABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'PD_ALMOXARIFADOS') AND A.HANDLEREGISTROORIGEM = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1951_at4177_hs2003a23b.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisições do almoxarifado>Atendidos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_REQUISICOES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(STATUS IN (4,8) AND QUANTIDADE <= QUANTIDADEATENDIDA AND (TIPO = 'O' OR TIPO='T') AND ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) AND ( @USUARIO IN (SELECT RESPONSAVEL FROM PD_ALMOXARIFADOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) ) OR @USUARIO IN (SELECT ALMOXARIFE FROM PD_ALMOXARIFES WHERE ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) ))) AND (A.ALMOXARIFADODESTINO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t868_at1468_hs82816aae.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisições do almoxarifado>Cancelados
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_REQUISICOES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(STATUS = 5 AND (TIPO = 'O' OR TIPO='T') AND ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) AND ( @USUARIO IN (SELECT RESPONSAVEL FROM PD_ALMOXARIFADOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) ) OR @USUARIO IN (SELECT ALMOXARIFE FROM PD_ALMOXARIFES WHERE ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) ))) AND (A.ALMOXARIFADODESTINO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t868_at1469_hs179322c4.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisições do almoxarifado>À atender
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_REQUISICOES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(STATUS = 2 AND QUANTIDADE <> QUANTIDADEATENDIDA AND (TIPO = 'O' OR TIPO='T') AND ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) AND ( @USUARIO IN (SELECT RESPONSAVEL FROM PD_ALMOXARIFADOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) ) OR @USUARIO IN (SELECT ALMOXARIFE FROM PD_ALMOXARIFES WHERE ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) ))) AND (A.ALMOXARIFADODESTINO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t868_at1467_hs978251ba.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
